timeline.bodyText: Should remove the line container the stray ;. However, I think we should rather test getPlatforms().
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: I think this should call setPlatforms(buildPlan.getPlatforms()).
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -610,8 +609,6 @@ public JibContainerBuilder applyContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan)
       throws InvalidImageReferenceException {
     containerBuildPlanBuilder
         .setBaseImage(buildPlan.getBaseImage())
-        .setArchitectureHint(buildPlan.getArchitectureHint())
-        .setOsHint(buildPlan.getOsHint())

timeline.author: chanseokoh
chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -297,8 +294,6 @@ public void setApplyContainerBuildPlan()
     ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan =
         ContainerBuildPlan.builder()
             .setBaseImage("some/base")
-            .setArchitectureHint("arch")
-            .setOsHint("os")

timeline.bodyText: We should keep the test (with getPlatforms()).
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.message: Intergrated the get/set platforms infrastructure into JibCOntainerBuilder

timeline.author: louismurerwa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -610,8 +633,8 @@ public JibContainerBuilder applyContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan)
       throws InvalidImageReferenceException {
     containerBuildPlanBuilder
         .setBaseImage(buildPlan.getBaseImage())
-        .setArchitectureHint(buildPlan.getArchitectureHint())
-        .setOsHint(buildPlan.getOsHint())
+        .setPlatforms(buildPlan.getPlatforms())

timeline.bodyText: Do not add new methods to JibContainerBuidler in this PR. You'll do it in #2589.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Did we already update the platform api to change the argument order? The one we deployed.
replies.author: louismurerwa

replies.bodyText: Yeah. If you look into the jib-build-plan 3.0 library, you'll see the actual code.
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -297,8 +295,7 @@ public void setApplyContainerBuildPlan()
     ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan =
         ContainerBuildPlan.builder()
             .setBaseImage("some/base")
-            .setArchitectureHint("arch")
-            .setOsHint("os")
+            .setPlatforms(ImmutableSet.of(new Platform("testOS", "testArchitecture")))

timeline.author: chanseokoh
chanseokoh

timeline.message:
Build plan release v0.3.0 (#2593)

* [Gradle Release Plugin] - pre tag commit:  'v0.3.0-build-plan'.

* [Gradle Release Plugin] - new version commit:  'v0.3.1-SNAPSHOT-build-plan'.

Use SystemSocketFactory instead of the default factory for SSL socket factory (#2592)

* Solving https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/issues/2585
* Using ApacheHttpTransport.newDefaultHttpClientBuilder() instead of constructing a complete new instance.
* Applied formatting.

Fixing the default platform in the build plan api (#2597)

* Fixing the api default platform

* Updating the CHANGELOG
Intergrated the get/set platforms infrastructure into JibCOntainerBuilder
